transcripts.text: If you haven't seen part two of this one-part series, you might want to do that first, because we're just going to pick up where we left off.  But the overriding question our Christian friend is trying to answer is, why didn't God just start everyone off in heaven?

All right, so the third reason is that heaven has a lot of great goods, but so does a world with suffering.  And since God wasn't forced to choose one over the other, he created a world that has both.
We have just entered the world of unbearable stupid.  If Cameron really thinks...
